titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide a temporary increase in the minimum end strength level for active duty personnel for the Army, and for other purposes.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide a temporary increase in the minimum end strength level for active duty personnel for the Army, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: Increases, during FY 2004 through 2008, the minimum end strength level for active-duty Army personnel from 482,400 to 522,400.
